title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 151.9 - Agency performance rating and advance reporting requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 151.9 - Agency performance rating and advance reporting requirement

State Regulations

Upon the request of the Director of the Budget, each agency
shall provide timely statistical reports of performance ratings and advances in
a manner prescribed by the director. Such reports shall be filed simultaneously
in a timely fashion with the Director of the Budget and the Director of

Employee Relations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
151.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
